messages.message: as long as /udfs and /schema are always being called together when a udf is edited, then i think we should be able to never call `db.UpdateProjectUdfsTableArgs`  for both single-class udfs and cross-class udfs
@ayesha.ali Should I make these backend changes as a part of my PR?

i think you can yeah, u can remove those two lines we talked about and u can test editing udfs in the ui for single class and cross class udfs (also ideally creating an app w/ single class udfs and running it)  + see if any unittests fail. if they do and more involved changes are needed, i can make those changes
